title: (Wed Early) Dylan Scott on Keeping Goals on Lock Screen and Performs His Hits + Richard Marx on Putting Abby on His Instagram + Amy’s Son is Giddy About Football
itunes:title: (Wed Early) Dylan Scott on Keeping Goals on Lock Screen and Performs His Hits + Richard Marx on Putting Abby on His Instagram + Amy’s Son is Giddy About Football
description:
Dylan Scott stops by the studio to talk about manifesting dreams, meeting his wife in 7th grade, his hometown of Bastrop, Louisiana and he performs some of his hits and a couple new songs from his album. We talk to 80’s icon Richard Marx because he posted a clip of Abby singing one of his songs in his Instagram. Amy shares that her son is giddy about football and he used jiu-jitsu move to tackle another kid.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
